website_summaries.verdict: Choose this flavored water if you don't mind stevia and like the idea of combination fruit flavors and generous-sized bottles.
pros: Consumers boast about the flavor combinations that include blackberry and blueberry, strawberry and dragonberry, and yumberry and pomegranate
contains vitamins B and C. Comes in 20 oz
cons: Some who have tried it complain about that aftertaste due to being sweetened with stevia extract
A few packs came with expired sell-by dates

customer_reviews.title: This water is my lifeline
customer_reviews.text: I can easily go so so far as to say this water has literally elevated my quality of life. Several years ago I was diagnosed with Stage IV breast cancer, and I take an amazing amount of medication daily. I was instructed to also always stay hydrated. The oncology nurses told me not to just drink water, but to find a beverage with flavor and vitamins and minerals, something I would like and keep using. After several different waters, I settled on these and have been drinking them for years. I hate to think what might happen if SOBE quit manufacturing them.
customer_reviews.author: Cinnamon

customer_reviews.title: Not a change for the better... Previously a 5 star product
customer_reviews.text: The change to SobeWater appears to be more than a cosmetic name change. This new beverage no longer contains erythritol which is a natural but expensive sweetener and now has that slight bitter after taste that you get from stevia. I loved Lifewater, SobeWater is second rate to their own discontinued product. I haven't heard of an explanation for the name change. Perhaps changing the name means not having to explain the removal of erythritol which is much more expensive than Stevia. I do see a bottled water in the store now called "Life WTR", which is probably cause of the name change. I'd love to hear SoBe's explanation of the name change as well as dropping erythritol.
customer_reviews.author: RonM

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: A local restaurant had this as a fountain option, and it quickly became one of my favorite drinks. Zero calories, zero carbs and zero sugars - check the label. Not so sweet, yet refreshing and very enjoyable. For fun, I even tried carbonating it at home - that added a fizz that works well, but truthfully it doesn't need it to be awesome. The interesting thing is, it's very difficult to find in the wild - so to solve that little dilemma, I setup a subscription! Now I get one of my favorite beverages delivered - what's not to like?
customer_reviews.author: Wizard

customer_reviews.title: Oddly, slows down urination.
customer_reviews.text: Can't figure out why SoBe would slow down urination but it seems to. Might be good for someone with Prostate problems that I don't have. Baffling as to why with only 1% sodium, it just doesn't run through my system the way water does. I use stevia in coffee and it isn't a problem so wonder just what is going on. The taste is fine but the stevia is heavier than it needs to be because it does leave an aftertaste that doesn't happen when I put stevia in my coffee and control the amount.
customer_reviews.author: Cloudy World

customer_reviews.title: Two Thumbs Up 👍👍
customer_reviews.text: Being stuck at home during this Covid-19 crisis has made me look for new drinks too try. I have never had Sobe Water before, thought I’d give it a go. I must say, really enjoyed it. Unlike everyone else, I didn’t care for the Strawberry/DragonFruit. I liked the other two flavors. I did notice the Expiration date was for July 20, 2020. Not sure if I just got a old batch or it just doesn’t last that long. Didn’t matter to me, drank all 12 in less than 5 days. I would recommend trying this.
customer_reviews.author: Big Crab

customer_reviews.title: Read the ingredients
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to find these on amazon as a 12 pack. However, the new flavor, yum berry pomegranate, pay close attention to the ingredients! I couldn’t figure out why I was developing a major rash and flare up on my face. A trip to the doc and steroids and finally the realization that this particular flavor was the cause! COCHINEAL EXTRACT (COLOR), ground up bugs for the red coloring, gross! A facade for red dye and a high allergen. This is THE ONLY product I have ever had this reaction to. won’t be buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: flower7652

customer_reviews.title: Post-bariatric surgery lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite flavor of Sobe water! I used to buy these all the time when they first came out, but eventually diet soda found its way back into my life. After weight loss surgery, soda is a no-no, but plain water gets nauseating after a while. What’s really nice is that my B12 levels are great, even though I’m not taking a B12 supplement anymore.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Only drawback, the case is too small!
customer_reviews.text: I can't express how much I love this drink! I have been trying to find a replacement for normal soda for many years, can't get rid of that darned sweet tooth, but this is one of the few drinks that I like, except that I LOVE IT! The flavors are perfectly balanced to not be overly sweet, not be bland, the water is actually good! I'm subscribed to get this stuff delivered monthly, and I may need to up that even more! I ten thousand percent recommend this to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: brandon m

customer_reviews.title: you have to hold your head sideways to drink out of these -
customer_reviews.text: the downside of ordering online. and i order everything on line but sometimes you get burned.
customer_reviews.author: Michael McGarrity

customer_reviews.title: Ketosis friend
customer_reviews.text: Good drain doesn’t seem to affect my ketosis. I really like the yummy berry pomegranate flavor. Note that some people may have different reactions as this is Stevia leaf but most won’t have an insulin spike from Stevia. For me at least I think this is a safe keto alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Jonah

customer_reviews.title: Tasty healthy drinks
customer_reviews.text: Why SoBe? The simple answer is stevia. Instead of AceK or some other garbage artificial sweetener, this one is actually good for you (or at least that's what they're telling us now!) I like 2 if the flavors much more than the third, which is the only reason this gets 4 instead of 5 stars. I'll keep buying it- maybe I'll learn to like them all. You can add it to half water/ice to make it last longer and lower the expense. It has plenty of flavor even when cut in half.
customer_reviews.author: J. Mastrolia

customer_reviews.title: Good for Keto but Pricey
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these online because I could not fin them at the store anymore. Gradually they pulled them from HEB, Kroger, Randalls (even though they were constantly selling out)..I would guess because they are one of the few Clean Keto beverages available (if the label is truthful.) These taste good and are refreshing. Good flavors. I wish they were not so pricey (about $1.50-1.75 per bottle.) Ouch. They have fewer carbs than the Vitamin Water Zero (Stevia & Erith) for no sugar preferences.
customer_reviews.author: Lara Toman

customer_reviews.title: Better than soda
customer_reviews.text: My grown up daughter likes the quality, and flavors of the drinks. I was surprised how much she liked them. I am a SOBE Elixir Citrus Energy addict and I've ordered them through Smith's (since Covid 19). I am always asking her to stop drinking soda. I have made her watched endless episodes of Dr. G; so what I do is keep finding great deals on Amazon for SOBE water. She will always take the SOBE water before taking the can soda.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tastes different than vending machines
customer_reviews.text: I've had this drink at vending machines and I love it...these bottles however had a strong artificial sweetener taste, which left a bad after taste. I was very disappointed, i didnt like it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: So I tried this on a whim....usually drink the Gatorade 0. I immediately drank one bottle after receiving and was so impressed with the taste. It's a little sweet but not too sweet which is what I really liked. I could feel the vitamin B kick in and this gave me a little boost of energy after drinking. I really loved the taste and will definitely buy again and try other flavors. Great stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Big T.

customer_reviews.title: My most favorite SoBe flavor, with Stevia too!
customer_reviews.text: I love this flavor more than any other in the SoBe waters. Our grocery rarely stocks it because most people will buy the berry flavors more often. I can't drink soft drinks or anything flavored that contains Aspartame; and I need to steer away from sugar. I was so happy to find full flats of this yummy water and have introduced it to a few of my friends and told them where to buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Ceara

customer_reviews.title: Good but over priced.
customer_reviews.text: These were very refreshing and delicious to drink. I was disappointed to see when I went to reorder the price had increased so much. I feel like too many sellers are trying to take advantage of the fact that people are trying to buy stuff online to lower the risk of covid 19. I won’t repurchase until the price lowers to a more honest price.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Hobart

customer_reviews.title: Healthful, Delicious and Thirst Quenching
customer_reviews.text: My diet doctor recommended the SoBe Water as a substitute for soft drinks. I have been drinking it for several years and find it quenches my thirst, gives me a needed healthy source of fluids and it is an overall treat. Ordering through Amazon usually gets it here in a day or two and I enjoy the variety pak of three flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Sal

customer_reviews.title: Tastes awful.
customer_reviews.text: I used to buy this flavor all the time. I could no longer find it in stores, so i ordered on here. The recipe must have changed since I had it years ago, the flavor is horrendous. I cant find a way to contact the seller to ask for a refund so I'm posting here hoping for a response. It honestly tasted like rubbing alcohol. Very strong aftertaste. So disappointed, threw them all away. :(
customer_reviews.author: Sammi Cottone

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Flavor and After Taste - SOUR APPLES!
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 cases because Vitamin Water was not in stock. The taste of this product is horrible. Does not represent Apple and Pear more like sour apples and bad pears. The aftertaste was horrendous- could not drink it, tried a few of the bottles to see if it was only 1 - NOPE they ALL tasted really bad. I would not recommend this particular product or especially this flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer and An Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: THEY LITERALLY DELIVERED DROPPED IT OFF BY THE ROAD - NOT MY DOOR - REALLY?
customer_reviews.text: THEY LITERALLY DELIVERED DROPPED IT OFF BY THE ROAD - NOT EVEN REMOTELY NEAR MY DOOR OR EVEN MAILBOX- REALLY? - FOUR CASES OF THIS BY THE ROAD - PERFECT. THANKS SO VERY MUCH. ;/
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Yuck
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be an OK apple juice substitute, for someone who tries to avoid sugar. It is so artificial tasting, like a weird pear-apple jolly rancher, I could not drink it.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Hackett

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: They took this product out of my grocery store for unknown reason but...amazon to the rescue! Great price for the value although the price fluctuates so keep an eye on it if it seems pricey one day it will be affordable the next! Love this stuff! Some say it has a slightly artificial taste but i didnt notice much and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: Love the flavor
customer_reviews.text: Really like getting them on a schedule. It is nice to have them delivered. I used to by them at Sams and Costco but they no longer carry them. This is the same price and I don't have to go get them and haul them home. they arrive every few weeks in the mail. LOVE IT
customer_reviews.author: ljsully

customer_reviews.title: Love the SoBe Water drinks
customer_reviews.text: I've always loved the SoBe water. Most stores no longer seem to carry this product, so I'm glad that I can purchase online. I love the yumberry pomegranate drinks with vitamins c and b, they are my favorite. I drink one a day and just feel better overall using this product.
customer_reviews.author: LaLise F

customer_reviews.title: Even better with ONLY stevia
customer_reviews.text: I am sugar free and had bought these locally when they had erythritol and stevia as a pop type drink. They have since stopped carrying it locally then I saw them on amazon. The price is great and they now only have stevia, which I prefer as I try to limit sugar alcohols. It tastes the same to but I don't have any issues with stevia.
customer_reviews.author: Digitaldoodlebug

customer_reviews.title: Yuck
customer_reviews.text: These were horrible. They must have arrived damaged. I took a big chug before I realized it tasted spoiled and had cloudy stuff in it
customer_reviews.author: Beautifulsight

customer_reviews.title: Much better than disgusting Bali
customer_reviews.text: I've been sobe water for a few years now and like the fact it is 0 calories and carbs unlike other sports drinks. When Kroger stopped carrying it I had to go to Publix, when they stopped carrying it I bought it here, anyway really good value. Also if you don't like the taste, don't review it badly, just don't get it.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting, healthy, flavored water
customer_reviews.text: My brother was given this in the hospital when he needed encouragement to drink fluids. Great flavor; no calories, sugar, or other unnecessary added ingredients. Now we get it delivered to make sure he stays hydrated when he tires of plain water.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Medicinal aftertaste-yumberry flavor
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the yumberry-pomegranate flavor. It has a cherry medicine type aftertaste I found offputting. I don’t want to waste, but I can barely bring myself to drink one a day. The flavor is like watered down kids cough syrup! Ick!
customer_reviews.author: Christalpistol

customer_reviews.title: Not the correct items on this order
customer_reviews.text: I have been very happy with my previous orders but this last order is all messed up. I ordered 6 cases of the Yumberry Pomegranate Sobe Lifewater but I received only 2 cases of the correct flavor. 2 cases were of the Fugi Apple & now I am told that the other 2 cases wont be coming until January 8th. I'm not very happy to pay $36 for something I did not order & also have to wait 2 weeks to get the rest of my order
customer_reviews.author: Gaylee A.

customer_reviews.title: Thirst quenching with vitamins to boot
customer_reviews.text: With the Covid 19 academic going on I've found this product quenching my thirst better than plan water plus it has the added vitamins. What I don't understand is why so costly $16 bucks is a high cost? & Why do we have to pay taxes on this water?
customer_reviews.author: David Rothrock

customer_reviews.title: Non carbonated drink
customer_reviews.text: I was getting a soft drink at Sam’s Club when I spotted this product at their self serve soda fountain. It had no calories no artificial flavor no acid no carbonation. I tried to drink just alkaline drinks due to acid reflex. The price was good and the drink was delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Pilmanis

customer_reviews.title: Best Water Ever
customer_reviews.text: This by far is the best flavored water out there IMO. It has gotten harder to find in my local stores, but thank goodness Amazon has it for me! I like it because it has no sugar, very low sodium and has a delicious flavor to it.
customer_reviews.author: Cass Monty

customer_reviews.title: Changed ingredients, different taste and causes digestive issues
customer_reviews.text: For years I drank this water until they no longer sold it in the grocery store. After about a year-and-a-half I was able to find it on Amazon for a reasonable price. They have obviously changed the formula and now the new water gives me serious digestive issues. Very disappointed and definitely do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S.

customer_reviews.title: Sobe Vitamin Waters
customer_reviews.text: I have always loved these drinks, but they are largely unavailable in stores now, or are extremely expensive. So, I am really happy that I can order them on Amazon for a good price. The only thing that would make me happier is to be able to order cases of my favorite, the Strawberry Dragonfruit, for the same price as a case of the 3 flavors. The case price for the Strawberry Dragonfruit is outrageous - it comes to more than $3.00 per bottle!
customer_reviews.author: npnote

customer_reviews.title: Good value-standard flavors
customer_reviews.text: Love Sobe just wish there were more flavors available. Not a lot of options out there for non sparkling water flavored water but Sobe has always been a favorite of mine. I like non carbonated beverages so this is definitely a re buy for me.
customer_reviews.author: Susieqyc

customer_reviews.title: Taste isn’t the original flavor.
customer_reviews.text: This SOBE doesn’t taste anywhere near as it good as it did years ago when a variety of SOBE flavors were readily available. Then we no longer had SOBE anywhere so we moved on. I was so excited to see it back in the store. Until I tasted it. Not close to the original taste. So long SOBE I knew you well.
customer_reviews.author: MS lady

customer_reviews.title: Beware - Check the expiration date!
customer_reviews.text: I just received my order today, 5/29/20. The expiration date on the product is 6/10/20. Not happy!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Tastes like baby pee.
customer_reviews.text: Trust me, if you've ever been sprayed while changing a baby boy's diaper, you'll know the lasting after-taste SoBeWater. Then again, if it tastes like baby pee it must be healthy. SoBeIt.
customer_reviews.author: P. Williams

customer_reviews.title: 2 out of 3 tasted good
customer_reviews.text: I love Strawberry Dragonfruit, and Yumberry Pomegranate is also pretty good. Unfortunately, I didn't enjoy the third flavor. It tasted very nasty to me and just wasn't to my taste at all. I figure someone must enjoy it though, so I ended up giving them to my mom, so they hopefully won't get wasted. I suggest only buying this pack if you know you like all of the flavors.
customer_reviews.author: TJ Sakura

customer_reviews.title: Sobe YES
customer_reviews.text: The product i have been loving, Great flavor without the sugar!! Price i have issues with!! i started buy for 15.50 in June, 4 months later it is now 24.00. I though Gas was Expensive! If my math is right it's almost $24 for 2 gallons of flavored water! Now....Today i received my order missing 1 bottle!
customer_reviews.author: Chad Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Nice variety pack, good product!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived perfectly! I wasn't able to find locally in my stores. They were always out of stock or not carrying this item so I thought I would try ordering online. So far so good and every convenient. Regular price point was about the same. I switch off with Vitamin water and drink one (either/or) each morning with my breakfast.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Nope!!!
customer_reviews.text: What horrible after taste! A bit of a chemical flavor aftertaste. Is it stevia ? Or some other fake flavor additive. Yikes. If I am buying this for health proposes.. i don’t need the extra color chemicals, and fake sweetener, etc.
customer_reviews.author: trevs

customer_reviews.title: Best SoBe flavor
customer_reviews.text: I’m a big fan of apple-pear anything and SoBe is no exception. This is sugar-free, but make no mistake, it’s sweet. This is the drink for someone who like sugary drinks but not the sugar or the calories.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Fast and convenient
customer_reviews.text: We are trying to eat healthier and drink healthier. My husband has been struggling with the craving for sweetened drinks because he doesn't cate for plain water. My product arrived quickly. My man loves these flavored waters and asked me to get it regularly 😁
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing Water
customer_reviews.text: I just love this water! My grocery store stopped selling it not sure why cause everyone was always buying it so I started buying it from Amazon. The flavors are very good and it's refreshing anytime.
customer_reviews.author: CMNH

customer_reviews.title: Tastes pretty good!
customer_reviews.text: Since Coca-Cola does not make the glacier water in my flavor anymore I thought I would try this brand but it’s a little too pricey for my taste. It will do for now. Nice flavor! I am always looking for drinks that have Stevia in them as opposed to sugar and that is not so easy to find! NEED MORE STEVIA DRINKS! 😉
customer_reviews.author: Mary F Hollingsworth

customer_reviews.title: Very pricy but delicious
customer_reviews.text: I am taking a star off because the price is too high and seems to take advantage of people who are practically addicted to it. I am not ordering more sadly, unless the price goes down a bit. I have found a substitute that I like and there is nothing wrong with drinking plain old water.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Can’t get enough of this stuff!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff, and it’s so hard to find in stores anymore. The fugi apple/pear flavor is so wonderful! Zero calories, sweetened with stevia, it’s about the only diet drinks I’ve ever found that I actually enjoy. I bought four cases. 😋 One case arrived with the outer plastic wrap torn open and missing a couple bottles, getting a replacement was completely hassle free.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Flanagan

customer_reviews.title: Great product delivered to your door and always in stock!
customer_reviews.text: My wife has loved this product for years. We always purchased for years in the local grocery stores. It is in stock some days and not others. Here we get it delivered to our door in a couple of days and it is always in stock.
customer_reviews.author: Cattleman's

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing and Tasty
customer_reviews.text: Have been wanting to try this for years. It doesn't disappoint. In fact, it is wonderful. Love all the flavors in the variety pack. Refreshing especially when working on the yard and tasty.
customer_reviews.author: Zia M.

customer_reviews.title: Great flavors! Heartburn might not be worth it
customer_reviews.text: These are great for our keto lifestyle my husband likes some flavored drinks and I hate artificial sugars. My husband has noticed that these cause heartburn for him for some reason now :(
customer_reviews.author: R. Tibbits

customer_reviews.title: Contains Stevia
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would just be flavored water with no sweetner. Ugh - terribly sweet. The product description here on Amazon says "contains no artificial sweeteners" - which technically may be true since stevia comes from a leaf - but it's definitely a sweetener. If you are just looking for flavored, unsweet water - move on.
customer_reviews.author: James E. Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Has after taste
customer_reviews.text: I though that this product would be hydrating to say the lease, but it has an after taste and left me wanting water afterward as it wasn't very hydrating. Wouldn't recommend drinking unless diluting with extra water.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yum!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff and it’s hard to find in my area. It came in one day and the price was average for what I have paid. Convenience counts for a lot with me, I’m happy!
customer_reviews.author: Nana

customer_reviews.title: Great, but way too expensive.
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it's yummy. I love this stuff as a mixer for Dr. Pepper. Makes for a great soft drink in a 4:1 ratio of DP/SoBe. But the cost! Just far and away too expensive for what you get. I bought it a couple of times and then said forget it.
customer_reviews.author: Some Useless Geek

customer_reviews.title: Bitter and Horrible Taste
customer_reviews.text: I used to buy the pomegranate drink all the time in my local KFC and I love it. I can’t find it anywhere else so I looked at amazon and sure enough, they had it. Unfortunately the “SobeWater” change from “SobeLifeWater” really made a difference. And not a good one either. I got the juices and they already expire next week which was a bummer because I don’t drink liquids besides water often. They tasted very bitter and like medicine. I wouldn’t recommend unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Landon Suarez

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Have always preferred these because of the stevia and it does not burn my tummy (some flavored waters do that to me). Am currently living the keto lifestyle and Life water is my go to product for hydration. Wish I could by the 32 ounce bottles which I was able to purchase in person in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Savvy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Sugar Free!!
customer_reviews.text: All of the flavors are fantastic!! I love these and have them set for delivery every month. It’s so much cheaper to buy like this than TRYING to find them in the gas stations on the way to work.
customer_reviews.author: Atlantis1021

customer_reviews.title: Very refreshing drink with no clories
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent drink and full of refreshing flavor and with no calories! I have ordered it several times. Thanks for the variety!
customer_reviews.author: David FW

customer_reviews.title: So Good and Refreshing But Expensive
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I like how there is no Aspartame. I wish Pepsi would have kept Aspartame out of the Diet Pepsi. I wish the price was lower. $17 for 12 is a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No After Taste
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff and can only find it on Amazon. Only wish they would just deliver like groceries and not put it in yet another box.
customer_reviews.author: S. L. Greenlow

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE THINGS
customer_reviews.text: These drinks are often hard to find in store, and when you find them online you usually have to get it in flavors you don't like or if you find flavors you like, people try to charge outrageous prices.. Finally they pair nice tasting flavors together, and they offer it at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Karla Clark

customer_reviews.title: This is my favorite flavor of enhanced water by anyone!
customer_reviews.text: If you like pears, you will love love love this ♥
customer_reviews.author: Suz

customer_reviews.title: Tastes bad
customer_reviews.text: Taste really bad because of Stevia. Try one from store before ordering.
customer_reviews.author: puebloan

customer_reviews.title: Love Sobe Waters
customer_reviews.text: The Sobe waters are great but hard to find. Having it shipped to my home for a lesser price than most stores is very convenient. They do not, however, ship to all addresses.
customer_reviews.author: lilj81

customer_reviews.title: I love this water!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am not a huge fan of flavored water. I have tried many brands and been disappointed until I tried SoBe. I love each of the 3 flavors in this variety pack and there is no sugar or caffeine which is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: CMG

customer_reviews.title: Met expectations
customer_reviews.text: Value has caused us to have this set for auto ship. We love the convenience of it arriving at our door. Check out prices at other stores. I would be surprised if you would find a better price. Thank you very much.
customer_reviews.author: Gary B

customer_reviews.title: Hilarious! Amazon driver delivered to wrond
customer_reviews.text: I have to drink a lot of water due to kidney problems. This flavored water makes that tolerable. It's a little expensive but in my opinion it's worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: AlexandraB

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: I love this water. it has a great subtle favor, no calories, and is not carbonated! It helps me consume the amount of water I need for each day. I wish it was sold in grocery stores in NC.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: After taste
customer_reviews.text: I tried to find a replacement for the regular vitamin water but this one leaves a metallic or sweetener taste, otherwise would be great.
customer_reviews.author: Real

customer_reviews.title: I love Sobe water!
customer_reviews.text: I love Sobe water, it is so tasty! I haven’t been able to find it in my stores anymore. Very happy to find it here
customer_reviews.author: PHanson

customer_reviews.title: Too sweet
customer_reviews.text: I'm on food stamps and almost 61 years old and each pack of sobee cost me 15.99 that means all not on food stamps had to pay 30
customer_reviews.author: Maryanne Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Favorite  flavored water !
customer_reviews.text: I love this water but it's no longer distributed in my area and I'm so bummed. Happy to find it available . The price is a bit high so only in a pinch. It's the best thing I like to drink. Good to know it's available !
customer_reviews.author: Ontheshoregirl

customer_reviews.title: No Calorie, Vitamin Enhanced, Flavored Water
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I don't like about this product is that I wish the case of 12 bottles came in more than 3 flavors. I drink this water every day. The case price is a good deal compared to grocery stores that only sell in single bottle prices. Always refrigerate. It enhances the flavor There are no calories, no carbonation, so you can feel free to drink as much as you want. I love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Karendd

customer_reviews.title: Taste really good and good value.
customer_reviews.text: These taste really good and are awesome for a no sugar drink. I don't like plain water so these are a great way to stay hydrated and the variety is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Tastes like medicine
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t really enjoy the flavors. They all kind of taste the same. It kind of tastes like medicine.
customer_reviews.author: Bang D

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love the stuff was so upset when local stores quit carrying it at all was so happy to find on Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor and nutrients for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are good for me when I dont get the vitamin water counterparts. Its flavorful and feels like it quenches the thirst when I need it to.
customer_reviews.author: Hom Tanks

customer_reviews.title: Best flavor, cheaper for me to buy on amazon
customer_reviews.text: I love this sobelife water!! It really about all I drink and only this flavor. I am not a water drinker and this helps me in that department. It has come up in price in the stores and so buying on amazon is a bit cheaper for me and I don’t have to go get them delivery is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I love these and better to get in case then spending so much on one. I haven’t found a flavor I don’t like
customer_reviews.author: Kerchenski

customer_reviews.title: Great product, hope they stop changing the recipe
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite drink of all time. Hope it does not get discontinued... it is getting harder to find. Also, the sweetener changed, so the flavor lost a little something. New bitter aftertaste.
customer_reviews.author: H.J.Feltz

customer_reviews.title: Not that good
customer_reviews.text: Not as expected. The sweetener tastes kind of chemically. Disappointed in the flavor. Will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Nurse Donna

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Honestly these just tasted terrible to me. I couldnt get past the fake "sugar free" taste. They left an aftertaste and the flavors were just not great.
customer_reviews.author: Christie

customer_reviews.title: variety is good 👍
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff vitamins. I don't know why but my hair is growing back??? Must be good 👍
customer_reviews.author: Krusty Meals

customer_reviews.title: Love Sobe!
customer_reviews.text: The best! I alternate between this water and Bai. Sobe is good when I need to stay away from caffeine. Great flavors and much cheaper than buying at the grocery store.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Sobe is a great alternative to Soda 😃
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. The taste is great. I like the automatic shipping with subscribe and save they are my favorite water 💧 substitute for the 🔥 summer weather
customer_reviews.author: Anthony  Smith

customer_reviews.title: Yum
customer_reviews.text: These taste great and are good for you. They are sweetened with Stevia, which is just one of two sweeteners that I am using consistently now. I found that I am sensitive to Sucralose, so finding something with Stevia instead is great.
customer_reviews.author: Restfinder

customer_reviews.title: PRICEY
customer_reviews.text: Husban's favorite drink but too much money and now I see the price went up even more.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara DeBartolo

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good
customer_reviews.text: These don’t last long around my house. They all taste great and are a great change from drinking water all day.
customer_reviews.author: alison859

customer_reviews.title: Love SoBe products
customer_reviews.text: I thought Lifewater was different than these. But after much research, I found out that it was really just a name change. The product has not changed. These three flavors taste great too!
customer_reviews.author: April L.

customer_reviews.title: Awful!!!
customer_reviews.text: The ad never mentioned 0 sugar or calories. Bad after-taste. Will never purchase your products again!!
customer_reviews.author: paulette l.

customer_reviews.title: Delicious flavored water
customer_reviews.text: Sobe water is an excellent blend of fruit flavors and water. It's hard to believe it's healthy. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: The only drink I can drink! Seriously!
customer_reviews.text: I have Sjögren’s Syndrome. I have dry mouth. My body doesn’t produce saliva. Water makes me nauseous. I have tried numerous drinks. The only drink which quenches my thirst or I can really stomach is Sobe Strawberry Dragonfly. Please give us more!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Sugar free with nice flavor
customer_reviews.text: Love the flavor, happy I can get it from Amazon since I can’t find it in the stores...
customer_reviews.author: Melissa R

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: Liked everything about this water. The price, taste, and availability. Would highly recommend v
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl B.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love So Be water.it has no calories and is very low sodium.wonderful flavors.great price.
customer_reviews.author: flowers

customer_reviews.title: Flavors are ok
customer_reviews.text: These are ok. That's my personal opinion I prefer Vitamin water zero just my taste buds I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing but Bitter to Me
customer_reviews.text: Refreshing but I think the bitterness in the after taste is unpleasant. I squeeze some lemon juice in it, which helps. I won’t buy anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Teacher in PA

product_meta.title: SoBeWater Variety Pack, 20 Fl Oz, 12 Count
product_meta.description: Flavor Name:3 Flavor Variety PackSobe water is a nutrient enhanced hydration beverage that is delicious, low in calories and naturally sweetened with sugar. With its unique flavor combinations, sobe water is naturally refreshing.
feature_bullets: 0-calorie sobe water is a vitamin enhanced water beverage that is a good source of antioxidant vitamin c. It has no artificial sweeteners and comes in delicious unique flavor combinations
Variety pack comes with three delicious flavors: black and blue berry, strawberry dragon fruit, and yumberry pomegranate
Is a good source of antioxidant vitamin c
20 ounce (pack of 12, 4 bottles of each flavor)

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
